verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In the morning when I rise,
In the morning when I rise,
In the morning when I rise, give me Jesus

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Give me Jesus, give me Jesus.
You can have all this world,
Just give me Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When I am alone,
When I am alone,
Oh, when I am alone, give me Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I come to die,
When I come to die,
Oh, when I come to die, give me Jesus.
